info.title: Commerce Admin REST endpoints - Tax Only
info.description: Tax-related endpoints and schemas from Adobe Commerce REST API

schema.description: id for the newly created Tax class
id for the newly created Tax class

get.description: Retrieve tax classes which match a specific criteria. This call returns an array of objects, but detailed information about each objectâ€™s attributes might not be included. See https://developer.adobe.com/commerce/webapi/rest/attributes#TaxClassRepositoryInterface to determine which call to use to get detailed information about all attributes for an object.

schema.description: id for the newly created Tax class
id for the newly created Tax class

get.description: Get a tax class with the given tax class id.

delete.description: Delete a tax class with the given tax class id.

schema.description: True if the tax class was deleted, false otherwise
True if the tax class was deleted, false otherwise

get.description: Search TaxRates This call returns an array of objects, but detailed information about each objectâ€™s attributes might not be included. See https://developer.adobe.com/commerce/webapi/rest/attributes#TaxRateRepositoryInterface to determine which call to use to get detailed information about all attributes for an object.

Search TaxRules This call returns an array of objects, but detailed information about each objectâ€™s attributes might not be included. See https://developer.adobe.com/commerce/webapi/rest/attributes#TaxRuleRepositoryInterface to determine which call to use to get detailed information about all attributes for an object.

real_base_amount.description: Real tax amount in base currency

type.description: Type (shipping, product, weee, gift wrapping, etc)

item_id.description: Item id if this item is a product

associated_item_id.description: Associated item id if this item is associated with another item, null otherwise

base_real_amount.description: Real tax amount in base currency

tax-data-tax-rate-search-results-interfa.description: Interface for tax rate search results.

tax-data-tax-rule-search-results-interfa.description: Interface for tax rule search results.

tax-data-tax-class-search-results-interf.description: Interface for tax class search results.
